pr_title: xds: not to use insecure DSA crypto

timeline.message:
xds: not to use insecure DSA crypto

Although DSA is only used in tests so it's totally no security concern, it's annoying we need some workaround for internal checks to import. So removing the usage.

timeline.author: sanjaypujare

replies.bodyText: EC is not disallowed. I also removed EC because you said "it might be okay to remove both DSA and EC since none of the tests is using those AFAIK" So we can delete unused code, if we do have EC case later we can add it back.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: Yes, I remember saying that but I was thinking we just make the minimal change necessary to unblock the import. Anyway we can add "EC" back if we ever need it (doubtful).
replies.author: sanjaypujare
